_comment_description: PWA configuration for installable app experience and native features
_comment_purpose: This manifest enables ShadowNews to be installed as a standalone app on mobile devices and desktop platforms, providing native app-like functionality including offline support, home screen installation, and OS integration.
_comment_architecture: The manifest defines app identity, visual appearance, behavioral characteristics, and platform integration features for the email-first social platform.
_short_name_purpose: Concise app name for home screen icons and launcher (max 12 chars recommended)
name: Shadownews - Where Ideas Snowball Into Communities
_name_purpose: Full app name displayed during installation and in app stores

icons._purpose: Legacy favicon for browser tabs and bookmarks
Standard Android home screen icon and app drawer
High-resolution icon for splash screens and app stores
Adaptive icon for Android that can be masked to different shapes
High-res adaptive icon for various Android launcher shapes

_start_url_purpose: Entry point when app is launched from home screen
_display_purpose: App runs in standalone mode without browser UI for native feel
_orientation_purpose: Preferred screen orientation, optimized for mobile usage
_scope_purpose: URL scope that determines which pages belong to this PWA
_theme_color_purpose: Brand color for system UI elements (status bar, task switcher)
_background_color_purpose: Splash screen background color while app loads
description: Enhanced Hacker News clone with email repositories and snowball distribution
_description_purpose: App store description and installation prompt details
_lang_purpose: Primary language for the application interface
_categories_purpose: App store categorization for discovery and classification

screenshots.label: Desktop home screen
screenshots._purpose: Desktop interface showcase for app store listings

screenshots.label: Mobile home screen
screenshots._purpose: Mobile interface preview for installation prompts

shortcuts.name: Submit Post
shortcuts._purpose: Quick access to content creation from home screen

shortcuts.name: Repositories
shortcuts._purpose: Direct access to unique email repository feature

_prefer_related_purpose: Prioritize PWA over native apps in app stores
_related_apps_purpose: List of related native apps (empty for PWA-first approach)

share_target._purpose: Enables sharing content TO ShadowNews from other apps
share_target._usage: When users share links/text from other apps, ShadowNews appears as share target
